pg004_services.title: IT Business
pg004_services.desc: We provide comprehensive IT solutions across a wide range of fields centered on finance, insurance, and social infrastructure — from business applications to infrastructure setup, cloud, and network operations.
fields: Insurance Business (Life, non-life, micro insurance, etc.)
Social Infrastructure Business (AWS, server setup, networking)
[Industries] Finance, banking, insurance, securities, credit / Embedded: automotive, communication devices / ERP・SAP
[System Types] Open systems, mainframes, Android, iOS
[Development Technologies] Java, C, Python, Cobol, ABAP, SQL Server, Oracle, Windows, Unix, mainframe, AWS (Azure)

pg004_services.title: Real Estate Business
pg004_services.desc: While IT remains our core business, we are also expanding into the real estate sector, actively engaging in property sales, construction, and leasing.
fields: Rental of investment properties such as shops

pg004_services.title: Major Development Achievements
pg004_services.desc: Below are some of the major areas we have worked on in the past.
fields: Business application development: finance (banking, credit card, securities), insurance, core system development for life and non-life insurance
Public DX: Public systems for municipalities, support for municipal DX using generative AI
Embedded: Automotive audio, autonomous driving control and verification
Telecommunications: Development and testing of communication devices
Infrastructure development using cloud environments (AWS / Azure)
Cloud services for transportation, food safety, and education
Support for Japanese companies' local business in China

projects.title: Internet Banking Infrastructure Construction

projects.title: Regional Bank Joint Center: Deposit, remittance, and loan operations
projects.responsibility: Detailed design to integration & system testing, maintenance

projects.title: Financial Systems: Core and peripheral development
projects.responsibility: Requirement analysis, design, development, testing, deployment

projects.title: Life Insurance: New contract system renewal
Non-life Insurance: Contract management and support system

Municipal DX: Smart City Web Portal
